The zheatmap package only contains a single function zheatmap to generate a clustered heatmap plot. The mtcars dataset from the dataset package is used as an example here for demostration. The mtcars dataset hase 32 rows and 11 columns.

```{r}
head(mtcars)
cars = mtcars[,-2]
```

The default 

```{r}
library(zheatmap)
zheatmap(cars)
```

```{r}
zheatmap(t(cars), scale="row", colSideBar = as.factor(mtcars[,2]))
```
